shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Dawit "Psalter" (fols. 3r-200va) I-1) Mäzmurä Dawit "Psalms of David" (fols. 3r-153r) I-2) Mäḥalǝyä näbiyat "The Canticles of the Prophets" (fols. 153r-169r) I-3) Mäḥalǝyä mäḥalǝy "Song of Songs" (fols. 169v-177v) I-4) Wǝddase Maryam "Praise of Mary" (fols. 178r-193vb) I-5) ʾAnqäṣä bǝrhan "The Gate of Light" (fols. 193vb-200va)
Additio 1.

txstates.txstate: The front board is broken and repaired. Quire IV is loosened. Holes and tears amended on fols. 3, 15, 20, 21,101. 1/3 of fol. 1 is cut off. A rectangular piece is cut out of fol. 90r (at the right margin).

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards (the front board ibroken and repaired). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible on the spine fold of the quires, close to the head and the tail of the codex.

squires.squire: A(2/fols. 1r-2v) – I(10/fols. 3r-12v) – II(10/fols. 13r-22v) – III(10/fols. 23r-32v) – IV(10/fols. 33r-42v) – V(10/fols. 43r-52v) – VI(10/fols. 53r-62v) – VII(10/fols. 63r-72v) – VIII(10/fols. 73r-82v) – IX(10/fols. 83r-92v) – X(9; s.l.: 7, stub after 2/fols. 93r-101v) – XI(10/fols. 102r-111v) – XII(10/fols. 112r-121v) – XIII(10/fols. 122r-131v) – XIV(10/fols. 132r-141v) – XV(10/fols. 142r-151v) – XVI(10/fols. 152r-161v) – XVII(10/fols. 162r-171v) – XVIII(10/fols. 172r-181v) – XIX(10/fols. 182r-191v) – XX(10/fols. 192r-201v).

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-1, I-2, I-3: all data for fol. 4r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-4, I-5: all data for fol. 179r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra (name of St. Mary in Texts I-4 and I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss. and Canticles; numbers of Songs; doxology at the end of each Song; title of Texts I-2, I-3 and I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; names of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118 and the traditional interpretation of the name of the first letter, Aleph; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

abbreviations.abbreviation: Text I-4 ሰ: for ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት: (e.g., fols. 178rb, 182ra, 186ra, 188ra, 193rab) ሰ፡ ቅ: for ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት:(e.g., fols. 179va, 180va, 183rb, 190rb) ሰ፡ ለ፡ ቅ: for ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት: (e.g., fols. 179rb, 193vb) Words or their abbreviations stand for the whole refrain. ሠ፡/ሠረ for ሠረቀ፡ በሥጋ፡ እምድንግል፡ ዘእንበለ፡ ዘርአ፡ ብእሲ፡ ወአድኅነነ (fols. 178rb-179ra) እ᎓/እስ፡/እስመ፡ for እስመ፡ በፈቃዱ፡ ወበሥምረቱ፡ አቡሁ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ መጽአ፡ ወአድኅነነ (fols. 179vb-181va) ኵ፡ for ኵሉ፡ ትውልድ፡ ያስተበፅዑኪ፡ ለኪ፡ ለበሕቲትኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ (fols. 182rb-184ra) ና፡ for ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ። እስመ፡ ሣህልኪ፡ ይኵን፡ ላዕለ፡ ኵልነ (fols. 185va-187va) ለ፡/ለኪ: for ለኪ፡ ለበሕቲትኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ እመ፡ ብርሃን፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ በስብሐት፡ ወበውዳሴ (fols. 188rb-188vb) ተፈ:/ተፈሥሒ: for ተፈሥሒ: ኦምልዕልተ፡ ጸጋ፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ እስመ፡ ረከብኪ፡ ሞገስ፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ምስሌኪ (fols. 190rb-191va) ወ፡/ወበ፡ for ወበእንተዝ፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ንጽሕት፡ ኵሎ፡ ጊዜ፡ ንስእል፡ ወናንቀዓዱ፡ ከመ፡ ንርከብ፡ ሣህለ፡ በኀበ፡ መፍቀሬ፡ ሰብእ (fols. 192va-193rb) Text I-5 ወል፡ ሣ፡ ይ፡ ሰ: for ወልድኪ፡ ሣህሎ፡ ይክፍለነ፡ ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት: (fols. 194rb-199vb) The abbreviations stand for the whole refrain. ወ፡/ወበ፡ for ወበእንተዝ፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ንጽሕት፡ ኵሎ፡ ጊዜ፡ ንስእል፡ ወናንቀዓዱ፡ ከመ፡ ንርከብ፡ ሣህለ፡ በኀበ፡ መፍቀሬ፡ ሰብእ (fols. 195rb-199vb).

otherdetails.otherdetail: - Traditional interpretation of the Hebrew letters (apart from the first letter) in Ps. 118 is missing. - The following Pss. are numbered incorrectly: Pss. 90: ፺፱, 92: ፻፪, 93: ፻፫.

additional.cont: Fol. 201ra: Excerpt from Mälkǝˁa wǝddase (zä-Sänbät) "Image of the Praise" (of Mary, reading for Saturday).
additional.det: Cp. Mälkǝʿa wǝddase Maryam "Image of the Praise of Mary", cp. Mälkǝʾa gubaʾe, ʾAśmära 1948 E.C., p. 13.

extras.extra: - The midpoint of the "Psalms of David" (in Ps. 77) is marked on fol. 78v. - The scribe reduced the size of his handwriting to accommodate the end of the written line: throughout the Ms.: fols. 10v, 25r, 52v, 82r. - The line is taken up: e.g., fols. 22v, 36r, 57v, 122v, 154v, 163r. - The name of the donor in the supplication formula has been erased: fol. 193vb. - Notes referring to the text are written in the upper margin, in a secondary hand: fols. 3r, 195r. - Short supplications are written in the upper margin, in a secondary hand; the donor's name was erased: fols. 42r, 52r, 85r (in red), 96r, 102r (in red), 153r (in red), 153v, 177v (in red). - Omissiones were inserted interlineally: fols. 11v, 43r, 116r. - Immediate corrections are indicated by thin lines above and below words or indicated by a line encircling the words: e.g., fols. 53r, 70v, 81r. - Corrections were written over erased words and passages, in a secondary hand: fols. 19v, 39v, 72r, 97v, 111v, 167r. - Erasures are marked with thin parallel lines: fols. 14r, 19v, 29r, 57v, 79r, 90r, 106v, 119v (in red), 154v, 157r, 187rb, 190va, 191rab. - Erasures are indicated with other markings: fols. 42r, 70r, 72r, 197va. - Erasures without marking: fols. 21r, 63v, 18vb. - Erased notes: fols. 111v, 152v, 200vab (several lines). - Calculation exercise in pencil: fol. 111r. - Minor notes and scribbles, in ink, pen and pencil: fols. 1rv, 2rv, 5r, 77v, 88r, 110v, 124v, 146r, 195ra.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: A coloured thread is inserted in the right upper corner of fol. 66r.

frames.frame: - Fol. 3r (incipit page of Text I-1): coloured (red and black) ornamental band; geometric motifs. - Fol. 52r (incipit page of Ps. 51): coloured (red and black) ornamental band; geometric motifs. - Fol. 102r (incipit page of Ps. 101): coloured (red and black) ornamental band; geometric motifs.
